Name: Word
Pre-Primer Dolch: Sentences

Name: a
Pre-Primer Dolch: A cat ran fast.^A bird sat high.^A dog barked loudly.

Name: and
Pre-Primer Dolch: I like apples and pears.^She ran and jumped.^We laughed and played.

Name: away
Pre-Primer Dolch: The dog ran away.^Put the toys away.^The clouds drifted away.

Name: big
Pre-Primer Dolch: The big tree swayed.^A big truck drove by.^I saw a big bird.

Name: blue
Pre-Primer Dolch: The sky looks blue.^She wore a blue hat.^I found a blue stone.

Name: can
Pre-Primer Dolch: I can jump high.^We can play later.^You can help me.

Name: come
Pre-Primer Dolch: Come play with me.^Please come inside.^Come sit here.

Name: down
Pre-Primer Dolch: Sit down now.^The sun went down.^He climbed down slowly.

Name: find
Pre-Primer Dolch: Find the red ball.^I can find you.^She will find help.

Name: for
Pre-Primer Dolch: This gift is for you.^I made lunch for us.^Save a seat for me.

Name: funny
Pre-Primer Dolch: That joke was funny.^The puppy is funny.^We saw a funny show.

Name: go
Pre-Primer Dolch: Let's go home.^Go get your coat.^We can go now.

Name: help
Pre-Primer Dolch: Please help me.^I can help you.^Help is coming soon.

Name: here
Pre-Primer Dolch: Come here now.^Put it here.^Here is your snack.

Name: I
Pre-Primer Dolch: I like ice cream.^I can read.^I am happy today.

Name: in
Pre-Primer Dolch: Put it in.^We are in class.^The cat is in bed.

Name: is
Pre-Primer Dolch: This is fun.^The dog is loud.^My cup is full.

Name: it
Pre-Primer Dolch: It is cold.^I lost it.^It fell down.

Name: jump
Pre-Primer Dolch: Jump over this.^I can jump high.^They jump together.

Name: little
Pre-Primer Dolch: The little bird chirped.^I saw a little cat.^She held a little toy.

Name: look
Pre-Primer Dolch: Look at this.^Look over there.^Look what I found.

Name: make
Pre-Primer Dolch: Make a wish.^I can make cookies.^Make it fun.

Name: me
Pre-Primer Dolch: Look at me.^Help me please.^Sit with me.

Name: my
Pre-Primer Dolch: My bag is blue.^This is my room.^My friend is here.

Name: not
Pre-Primer Dolch: I am not tired.^Do not run.^That is not mine.

Name: one
Pre-Primer Dolch: I ate one cookie.^One bird flew by.^He has one toy.

Name: play
Pre-Primer Dolch: Let's play outside.^They play soccer.^We can play later.

Name: red
Pre-Primer Dolch: I saw a red car.^The apple is red.^She wore red shoes.

Name: run
Pre-Primer Dolch: Run to me.^I can run fast.^They run together.

Name: said
Pre-Primer Dolch: She said yes.^He said hello.^Mom said stop.

Name: see
Pre-Primer Dolch: I see you.^See the stars.^See what I drew.

Name: the
Pre-Primer Dolch: The dog barked.^The sun is bright.^The book is new.

Name: three
Pre-Primer Dolch: I have three cats.^She ate three cookies.^Three birds flew away.

Name: to
Pre-Primer Dolch: Go to bed.^Walk to school.^Talk to me.

Name: two
Pre-Primer Dolch: I saw two dogs.^Two kids played.^He has two books.

Name: up
Pre-Primer Dolch: Stand up.^Look up there.^Climb up slowly.

Name: we
Pre-Primer Dolch: We are friends.^We can play.^We saw the moon.

Name: where
Pre-Primer Dolch: Where is mom?^Where are we?^Tell me where to go.

Name: yellow
Pre-Primer Dolch: The sun is yellow.^She wore yellow boots.^I drew a yellow star.

Name: you
Pre-Primer Dolch: You are kind.^I see you.^You can try.
